resources.string: We encourage students to be curious, solve personally relevant problems and express themselves through creativity. As students proceed through our pathway we increasingly shift responsibility to students to formulate their own questions, develop their own solutions and critic their own work.
Teachers have the professional expertise to determine how to best conduct an engaging and relevant class.

Disney Coding started in 2019 to teach coding for kids and Computer Science to K â€“ 12 kids. It is Gujarat, India-based Company. Disney Coding provides training to kids (Grade 1 to 12) on Coding, Robotics, Space Tech, etc.
as per INTERNATIONAL STANDARDS: CSTA, ISTE. Course curriculum adapted from Google, Microsoft, NASA, MIT etc. So we award certificates of Microsoft, Google And NASA after course completion.
